authors.name: Nicholas Sherman
authors.affiliation: University of Virginia Biomolecular Analysis Facility Core

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"aaj9h","text":"General use of the SpeedVac for drying samples that contain aqueous or organic solvents. This is room temp and does not keep samples frozen like lyophilization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6kmc6","text":"SpeedVac 1030 - Integrated Vacuum Concentrator - Thermo Scientific - part#  SPD1030-115","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k027","text":"Glass Condensation Flask- Thermo Scientific - part# GCF400","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ml1","text":"CryoCoolTM (SCC1) Heat Transfer Fluid - Thermo Scientific - part# SCC1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":8,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b544l","text":"Rotor: Savant 120 x 1.5 mL Vac Conc RTR - Thermo Scientific - part# RH12011","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ois7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dthjm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0dqa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e7apg","text":"First start day:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54vh6","text":"--\u003e Ensure that the refrigerated trap contains a clean, dry, Glass Condensation Flask (GCF400) and that the supply of Thermo Scientific CryoCoolTM (SCC1) Heat Transfer Fluid is sufficient.\nThe CryoCoolTM in the refrigerated trap must be cold before drying runs can begin. Turn unit on at least 45 minutes before starting the drying run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":144,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":201,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2phb0","text":"\nFor best results, in our Core we maintain electrical power to the system (the main power switch on the front of the unit in the lower right is “ON” and the front display is illuminated) at all the times to keep the refrigerated trap cold and ready for use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"299sf","text":"Two modes of operation: with or without a fixed run time:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2cu9l","text":"Manual run - Starts a “Manual” run based on the parameters loaded in the screen, use manual run function if you do not want to set a fixed run time.\nAuto run - Starts an “Automated” run based on the parameters loaded in the screen, use auto run function if you want to set a fixed run time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":149,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ajc2","text":"Auto run for peptides in 70% ACN/0.1% F.A or 0.1% TFA:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36am0","text":"The unit is turned on and the cover is unlocked.\nThe display is lighting up and shows the following in sequence:\nSet values:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v05t","text":"   Temperature 45°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9beeo","text":"   Run time 2.00 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csfe","text":"   Vacuum Pressure 5.1 Torr ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qbdp","text":"   Ramp vacuum: 5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvdc5","text":"Open cover, add samples with the lids open and organized samples to be equilibrated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19evn","text":"Close cover","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74vo5","text":"Click Auto-run","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"664hv","text":"Pay attention to listen cover lock sound and air removal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3ggm","text":"Wait few minutes and make sure the vacuum pressure is going down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cc633","text":"Auto run for metabolites  in methanol/water:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kvm1","text":"The unit is turned on and the cover is unlocked.\nThe display lights up and shows the following in sequence:\nSet values:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4p90","text":"   Temperature 45°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ev6b","text":"   Run time 4.00 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93kdq","text":"   Vacuum Pressure 5.1 Torr ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dikd","text":"    Ramp vacuum: 5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3b7u","text":"Open cover, add samples with the lids open and organized samples to be equilibrated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0qfs","text":"Close cover","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u8fv","text":"Click Auto-run","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2lg91","text":"Pay attention to listen cover lock sound and air removal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ni37","text":"Wait few minutes and make sure the vacuum pressure is going down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8kuir","text":"Auto-stop sound during auto run mode:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3dfvf","text":"1 beep that is repeated until the user pushes the Stop button or opens the cover of the concentrator ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":50,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":100,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: BAF_S07_SpeedVac SPD1030
